name: Synthesia
description: Synthesia turns text into professional videos with AI avatars in minutes, no cameras or actors needed.
about: Synthesia is the leading AI video creation platform that allows you to create professional videos without cameras, studios, or actors. Choose from over 140 diverse AI avatars, support for 120+ languages, and create engaging video content at scale. Perfect for training videos, marketing content, and corporate communications.

seo.metaDescription: Synthesia turns text into professional videos with AI avatars in minutes, no cameras or actors needed.
